name: The Player Who Saved Christmas
description:
Santa has been captured by biotech zombies! 

Your mission if you choose to accept is to travel into the snowy mountain of the north pole. Eliminate all biomech zombies and rescue Santa.

Good Luck Agent!

--Controls--

Psx mouse required!

Left mouse click to shoot 

Right mouse click to reload

Credits:
